comments:
1. given a project under cvs control
2. given CVS Repo Browsing perspective open (with history view by default)
3. in the resource perspective, add a new file to the project in (1)
4. select the file.

We die because we are trying to update the history (which is in another 
perspective) for an unmanaged file.

The steps are not as simple as I layed out.
I cannot reproduce this - I am not sure by what steps I had the history 
watching for selection.

If you close/open the CVS Repo perspective you can reproduce the bug. 
Presumably the view stops listening for selection changes if it gets an error.
Fixed. Feature removed. That'll learn ya.
